nodes.text: KOTOR Campaign Guide Web Enhancement 7: Shasa

KOTOR Campaign Guide Web Enhancement 7: Shasa was an online supplement for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on October 22, 2008 and was a seventh in the series of web enhancements, which present material that didn't made it into Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide because of space reasons. This article covered Shasa and the Order of Shasa.
